attributes.contentHtml:
Of course it was an exit scam, no ViaHost's actually last.

Also, Bad wouldn't sell data- he doesn't know how. Keep in mind he is a child, he's not some genius. Fair plays to him for pulling this off though, quite a risky operation.

If you noticed too, Lellis was staff there- he previously made a host on Azure credits and Bad was the one that made a WH thread about him.

I don't think Bad had any bad intents but it wasn't really his fault the nodes expired either, it was Lellis'.

He actually did get a Contabo node. I use "get" because everyone is saying he stole his dad's bank card to get it so I am unsure.

Yet again, it's kinda all the Executives fault.

attributes.bio: my cover is a cars meme I found on facebook
